  com.jcatalog.grailsflow.utils.JSONConverter

public abstract class JSONConverter

Provides usefull methods for convert java objects to JSON presentation.

Method Detail

fromJSON

public static java.lang.Object fromJSON(java.lang.String json, java.lang.Class clazz)
Read JSON string from String then converts them to object of Class class. If there are occured some errors method throws IllegalArgumentException.
Parameters:
json - - a String cantaining JSON presentation of Java object.
clazz - - the class to which the JSON object should be mapped.
Returns:
the result Java object.

fromJSON

public static java.lang.Object fromJSON(java.lang.String json, java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType type)
Read JSON string from String then converts them to object of type which describes by ParameterizedType parameter. If there are occured some errors method throws IllegalArgumentException.
throws:
IllegalArgumentException when an error occurs during reading or mapping data to object.
Parameters:
json - - a String cantaining JSON presentation of Java object.
type - - a type indication to which the JSON object should be mapped.
Returns:
the result Java object.

fromJSON

public static java.lang.Object fromJSON(java.io.Reader reader, java.lang.Class clazz)
Read JSON string from Reader then converts them to object of Class class. If there are occured some errors method throws IllegalArgumentException.
throws:
IllegalArgumentException when an error occurs during reading or mapping data to object.
Parameters:
reader - - a reader containing JSON presentation of Java object.
clazz - - the class to which the JSON object should be mapped.
Returns:
the result Java object.

fromJSON

public static java.lang.Object fromJSON(java.io.Reader reader, java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType type)
Read JSON string from Reader then converts them to object of type which describes by ParameterizedType parameter. If there are occured some errors method throws IllegalArgumentException.
throws:
IllegalArgumentException when an error occurs during reading or mapping data to object.
Parameters:
reader - - a reader containing JSON presentation of Java object.
type - - a type indication to which the JSON object should be mapped.
Returns:
the result Java object.

toJSON

public static java.lang.String toJSON(java.lang.Object bean)
Converts object to JSON presentation.
Parameters:
bean - - object to convert, accept null values.
Returns:
JSON presentation of bean object, empty object if bean is null
